thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: DRC cash convoy hit

author: news24.com
title: DRC cash convoy hit
text:
Bukavu - Thirteen people have been killed in the restive east of the Democratic Republic of Congo in an attack on a convoy transporting some $40 000 in salaries for civil servants, Finance Minister Modeste Bahati said.
The attack occurred on Sunday afternoon in the Uvira area of South Kivu.
According to a military source and the Trust Merchant Bank, which was tasked with transporting the funds, 11 soldiers escorting the convoy and two civilians were killed.
